price: Naho ba bandi bashikamye ku gitabo bakanahozaho iswala.[1] Mu by’ukuri ntituburizamo ibihembo by’abakora ibyiza.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ
footnotes: [1]  Reba uko twasobanuye iyi nyito mu murongo wa 62 muri Surat ul Baqarat.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yumassikūna bil-kitābi wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata innā lā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muṣ'liḥīna
